SAMPLER_UNIFORM - Static variable in class net.jibini.glutils.GLUtils
Name of the texture sampler shader uniform.

Changes the size of the display.

Restores matrices to the identity matrix.

Changes the title of the display.

Sends matrices to the given shader.
setVSync(boolean) - Method in class net.jibini.glutils.Display
Changes whether VSync is enabled.

Utility class for handling shader programs.
